name: df-hpg
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, setvar s6, setvar s7
body: |- wceq(chpg, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, crn(cfv(clng, cv(s0))), copab(s2, s3, wsbc(s4, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wsbc(s5, cfv(citv, cv(s0)), wrex(s6, cv(s4), wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s2), cdif(cv(s4), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s6), cdif(cv(s4), cv(s1)))), wrex(s7, cv(s1), wcel(cv(s7), co(cv(s2), cv(s5), cv(s6))))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s3), cdif(cv(s4), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s6), cdif(cv(s4), cv(s1)))), wrex(s7, cv(s1), wcel(cv(s7), co(cv(s3), cv(s5), cv(s6)))))))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ hpG =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà ran((LineG ` s0))‚Ü¶ { < s2, s3 > |[(Base ` s0)/ s4][(Itv ` s0)/ s5]‚àÉ(s6 ‚àà s4,(((s2 ‚àà(s4 \ s1)‚àß s6 ‚àà(s4 \ s1))‚àß ‚àÉ(s7 ‚àà s1, s7 ‚àà(s2[s5]s6)))‚àß((s3 ‚àà(s4 \ s1)‚àß s6 ‚àà(s4 \ s1))‚àß ‚àÉ(s7 ‚àà s1, s7 ‚àà(s3[s5]s6)))))}))
comment: Define the open half plane relation for a geometry ` G ` . Definition 9.7 of [Schwabhauser] p. 71. See ~ hpgbr to find the same formulation. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Mar-2020.)
